'''Windwheel Aster Seed''' is a [[Gardening]] Material which can be obtained by harvesting [[Windwheel Aster]] with the [[Seed Dispensary]] or purchased from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=5}}.
